response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $7,200. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring you receive a high-quality product that meets your requirements. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 7200}
